description: Session handoff files for continuity across RAM wipes

.claude/sessions/2025-10-04-1305-hal8000.summary: Initial HAL8000 architecture design implementing von Neumann principles, assembly concepts, and Unix philosophy.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-04-1349-operati.summary: Register architecture and Operating Principles added to BIOS for CPU behavior and resource management.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-04-1455-system-.summary: System health check command and hierarchical indexing implemented for production-ready infinite scale.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-04-1519-hal7000.summary: HAL7000 BIOS analysis integrated: verified boot sequence, degraded mode, hal-context-finder agent.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-04-1612-v1-0-0-.summary: HAL8000 v1.0.0 production release with agent YAML frontmatter, validation, and state drift detection.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-04-1738-researc.summary: Research-synthesizer agent refactored to handle any web research task, not just complex technical topics.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-05-0927-library.summary: Library architecture and agent co-processor model developed with dual indexing system.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-05-1130-package.summary: Package manager implemented for library lifecycle management with Fabric patterns library import.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-05-1459-context.summary: Context Awareness Protocol implemented to detect missing context and ask user before loading.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-05-1531-mcp-int.summary: MCP management system with dynamic server control for RAM optimization implemented.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-05-1559-mcp-std.summary: MCP server configuration migrated to pure stdio transport with environment variable expansion.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-05-1637-gemini-.summary: Gemini CLI (1M token context) and Docker CLI integration for containerized execution.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-08-1551-referen.summary: HAL8000 Reference Manual v1.0.0 started with first 3 sections (Introduction, System Overview, Core Concepts).

.claude/sessions/2025-10-09-1642-refman-.summary: 5 additional manual sections completed using parallel documentation-writer agents.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-09-1732-refman-.summary: Batch 2 processing: 1 of 4 sections integrated, 3 ready for integration.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-10-0715-refman-.summary: Batch 3 processing: 2 of 3 sections integrated, Command Reference section ready.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-10-1309-batch6-.summary: Batch 6 completed, Reference Manual v1.0.0 finished.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-10-1642-phase2-.summary: Phase 2 editorial review: 8 of 9 sections completed.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-13-1000-diagram.summary: Diagram generation tool integrated using Mermaid CLI in Docker container.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-13-1435-refman-.summary: Diagrams integrated into Reference Manual sections.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-14-0848-diagram.summary: All diagram integration completed for Reference Manual.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-14-1618-v1-1-0-.summary: HAL-Script language formalized as natural language programming language, HAL8000 v1.1.0 released.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-15-0735-session.summary: Session-end bug fixed for proper state persistence.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-15-0753-boot-pr.summary: Boot protocol investigated and diagnostics performed.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-15-0903-prompt-.summary: Prompt Template System phases 1-2 completed with 7 levels of templates.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-15-1030-prompt-.summary: Prompt Template System phase 3 completed, full template library operational.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-15-1200-yaml-fr.summary: HAL8000 v1.2.0 released with YAML frontmatter and Prompt Template System.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-15-1417-refman-.summary: Reference Manual v1.1.0 released with complete diagram integration.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-15-1511-refman-.summary: Reference Manual diagram fixes and corrections applied.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-16-0917-v1-3-0-.summary: HAL8000 v1.3.0 released with intelligent knowledge ingestion and classification system.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-16-1008-v1-4-0-.summary: HAL8000 v1.4.0 released with Docling PDF processing tool integration.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-16-1212-github-.summary: HAL8000 deployed to GitHub as public repository.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-22-1619-image-g.summary: Image generation tool implemented using ComfyUI with Stable Diffusion models.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-23-1030-image-g.summary: Image generation tool v1.6.0 completed with SDXL/SD1.5, FLUX investigation planned.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-23-1432-image-g.summary: FLUX model investigated and determined incompatible with HAL8000 architecture.

.claude/sessions/2025-10-23-1537-image-g.summary: HAL8000 v1.6.1 released with fast text overlay tool, FLUX cleanup completed.
